text: Ni bu zhidao ma? Zhenzhu cong yun zhong jiangxia yushui, ranhou shi ta shenru di li, chengwei quanyuan; ranhou, jie ta shengchu ge zhong zhuangjia, ranhou hemiao diaoling, ni kan ta bian cheng huang de, ranhou ta shi ta bian cheng suipian. Zai nalimian, duiyu you lizhi zhe, dique youyi zhong jiaohui.
